description:
http://anidb.net/ch102013 [Nike], a boy from the http://anidb.net/ch102052 [Boering Village], is forcefully sent along on a quest to defeat the Devil King after his Hero-worshipping parents see a posting from the king summoning potential heroes.
Following the village`s traditions, he visits the http://anidb.net/ch102030 [magical old lady] where he is entrusted with caring for a young girl named http://anidb.net/ch102014 [Kukuri], who can use the mysterious Guru Guru magic. According to the old woman`s claims, Kukuri is the last survivor of the Migu Migu clan who wield Guru Guru, and she has been waiting for a Hero to appear.
It will be a journey filled with laughter, and occasional tears. And now the classic fantasy featuring a slacker Hero and a naive young Mage begins unfold!
Source: crunchyroll
Note: The first two episodes get an advance airing on June 17, 2017. Regular TV airing started in July 2017.

REGULAR.description:
Long ago, the Demon King was sealed away thanks to the special magic known as Guru Guru. 300 years later, he has returned, and humanity is waiting for a hero who will rise up to oppose him. Unfortunately for them, all they`ll get instead are the lazy Nike and the naive Kukuri, who set out on an adventure to save the world.
Source: crunchyroll

The northern town of North is plagued by misfortune now that monsters have moved into nearby Saw Mountain. Our heroes are unsure about whether they can help liberate the town, but when a monster kidnaps Kukuri and a local girl, Nike doesn`t have much of a choice but to take action.
Source: crunchyroll

What are the secrets of Guru Guru? Even Kukuri, the last known inheritor of the magic techniques, doesn`t know for sure. It`s just then when a mysterious woman appears who may have some answers.
Source: crunchyroll

Nike and Kukuri meet with a mysterious society, and that meeting sends them on a quest to gain the strength to beat the Demon King.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おでかけ! 修行ハウス!

REGULAR.description:
While Kukuri`s Guru Guru training proceeds, Nike has to team up with the priestess Juju to save the village of Dohgma.
Source: crunchyroll

With their training complete, Nike and Kukuri continue their journey only to run into a fearsome new rival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ライバル登場! アッチ村!

REGULAR.description:
The quest continues as Nike and Kukuri arrive in a fairy village, where the elder offers to share new Guru Guru secrets in exchange for the defeat of a nearby monster.
Source: crunchyroll

Nike and Kukuri are reunited with an old friend, and head to Cattongue Valley in pursuit of the daemon, Siren.
Source: crunchyroll

Kukuri and her party arrive in mysterious ruins with a mysterious connection to her past, and before heading to Endless Tower.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mystery! Ruins of the Migu Migu Clan!
神秘! ミグミグ族の遺跡!

REGULAR.description:
At the top of Endless Tower, Nike, Kukuri, and Toma confront one of the Demon King`s enforcers in a battle to reach Siren.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 攻略! きりなしの塔!

REGULAR.description:
Captured by a group of thieves in the kingdom of Copahl, Kukuri and her hero get wrapped up in a plot involving an evil chancellor and a magic artifact.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 弟子入り! コパの森!

REGULAR.description:
Joined by Runrun, Juju, and Sly the thief, our heroes enter Copahl Castle in an attempt to rescue its princess and retrieve the Banana Moon, a powerful magic relic.
Source: crunchyroll

Having saved the kingdom of Copahl, Nike and Kukuri find themselves headed towards a strange land inhabited by monsters. But are they friend or foe?
Source: crunchyroll

Nike and Kukuri find a hint that might lead them to the next daemon, but Giri`s forces are intent on sabotaging their relationship before that happens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 摩訶不思議! アラハビカ!

REGULAR.description:
With Kukuri having been turned into a demon it`s up to Nike and Toma to find a way to turn her back to normal, while also tracking down the location of the daemon hidden near Alahabica.
Source: crunchyroll

The hidden ruins of Panfos have appeared, but the Demon King`s army is planning an assault. Can Nike and his friends defend the tower and find Kukuri, who has gone missing inside of it?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 守れ! パンフォスの遺跡!

REGULAR.description:
Nike and Kukuri tread through a scorching desert and make their way to Erueru village, where they learn of a ritual that may help the hero unlock his next level of magic.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鳴らせ! エルエル村!

REGULAR.description:
On their way to the Land of Flowers, Nike and Kukuri arrive at Ettle Village, a town known for it`s chocolate. After finding out that monsters are keeping the confectionery business shut down, they head into the woods in pursuit of satisfying Kukuri`s sweet tooth.
Source: crunchyroll

With Kukuri kidnapped by Raid and the Queen of Flowers under assault, can Nike rescue his traveling companion and protect their surrogate daughter?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 歌え! バトーハの塔!

REGULAR.description:
Nike and Kukuri have been on Lef Island for a while now, and while their time there is pleasant, they find themselves having a hard time moving on. Are they just enjoying the island`s leisurely place, or is there something stranger going on?
Source: crunchyroll

While Nike and Kukuri were trapped on Lef Island, the Demon King was revived! With the demonic threat looming larger than ever, they hurry to the Jitari Ruins to obtain the next tool in their quest.
Source: crunchyroll

An ancient secret rests within the Jitari Ruins, and the Demon King`s forces have kidnapped Juju to unleash it. WIll Nike, Kukuri, and Toma arrive in time to save their friend?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 潜入! ジタリの遺跡!

REGULAR.description:
After all their struggles, Nike, Kukuri, and their friends have arrived in the Demon King`s territory: the continent of Zan. But before they can confront the master of evil, old rivals will stand in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

It`s all come down to this moment... the hero Nike must defend companion, the Guru Guru user Kukuri, as she attempts to seal away Demon King Giri. With the fate of the world in the balance, can they overcome the overwhelming dark powers of an entity that threatens to overwrite all of reality? And even if they do win, what will become of them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 発動! 恋するハート!
Mahoujin Guru Guru: Housou Start Chokuzen Special!! Domino de Mahoujin! Kansei Suru made Kaeremasen!
魔法陣グルグル 放送スタート直前スペシャル!! ドミノで魔法陣! 完成するまで帰れません!
